title: Fan, mid-19th century
medium: Medium: ivory, silk painted in tempera
description: Fan with guards and sticks of ivory, finely carved; leaf, one side of silk painted with three scenes showing groups of people, two medallions showing landscapes and two bunches of flowers, other side of paper, painted decorated with textiles in design of central medallion showing a group of people, surrounded by twelve smaller ones with people, animals, birds and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Medium: ivory, silk painted in tempera. Gift of Samuel L. Israel. 1940-119-2.
